page.title: 12HUNDLETON COUNCIL,PEMBROKE.
page.content: At the last meeting of{Hundleton {Community Council,}it was reported that various letters had been received about the zinc fence road. It was decided to write to{Dyfed {County Concil}asking if the path could be downgraded from a bridleway to a footpath. The clerk was asked to write to the county council's highways department requesting the repair of the road outside Brynheulog House,and the repair of the stop-cock outside 3 Bentlass Road,which was damaged when the road was re-surfaced.It was mentioned that the road surface at North Lodge,and the stretch between Mellaston and North Lodge,was in need of repair.
